title: CVD Risk Explanation
subtitle: 10-year risk of (fatal and non-fatal) CV events

nonhdlWarning.title: Non-HDL cholesterol out of range
nonhdlWarning.message: Petal-X is based on the SCORE2 Risk Charts, which evaluate CVD risk for patients between 40 and 69 years of age, with a systolic blood pressure between 100 - 180 mmHg and a non-HDL cholesterol between 3 and 7 mmol/L. Please note that patients with examination data over these value range are automatically at higher risk.

riskExplanationWarning.title: CVD Risk Explanation not available
riskExplanationWarning.message: For the given combination of patient risk factors, Petal-X cannot currently explain the individual contribution of each risk factor to the overall CVD risk. The SCORE2 risk calculation remains valid, but the visual explanation cannot be displayed accurately for this specific combination of values.
